nodes.text: The Llanic Spice Run was a hyperspace trade route and smuggling run located in the Outer Rim Territories. The route traveled through the Thuris sector and the Torch Nebula before reaching its terminus at the appropriately named space station Spice Terminus in Parmic sector.
During the time of the Galactic Empire this route was constantly patrolled by Moff Abran Balfour's Sector Group.
